channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Cold snap chills New York City's rats, and heats up the fight against them
WATCH: Skater plays hockey on icy Canal Street in New Orleans
item.description: The historic winter storm that hit the Gulf Coast left New Orleans covered in snow – and at least one person was spotted skating along the city's famo...

item.title: Cracks emerge in House GOP after speaker’s threat to saddle California wildfire aid with conditions
Idaho murders suspect's lawyers want DNA evidence thrown out
item.description: Bryan Kohberger is charged with four counts of murder in the deaths of Ethan Chapin, Xana Kernodle, Madison Mogen and Kaylee Goncalves.

item.title: 7 cops shot one after the other while responding to call for help from apartment
item.description: Seven police officers have been shot one after the other after responding to a call made from inside a home in San Antonio, Texas, police said.

item.title: Brothers say Hawaii police framed them for tourist's 1991 murder
item.description: Albert "Ian" Schweitzer, who spent over two decades in prison for the killing of Dana Ireland, was released in 2023 based on new evidence.

item.title: Sepulveda Fire ignites near 405 Freeway, with temporary evacuation warnings in Bel Air
item.description: It was first reported just after 11 p.m. near northbound lanes of the freeway in Sherman Oaks, according to the Los Angeles Fire Department.

item.title: Plane Passenger Teaches Fellow Traveler a Lesson After They Try to Guilt Them Into Swapping Seats
The Gulf of Whatnow? Mapmakers grapple with Trump’s geographic renaming plans
item.description: Mapmakers and teachers are re-thinking what to call the gulf of water between Mexico, the United States and Cuba after President Donald Trump ordered ...

item.title: Saudi crown prince says the kingdom intends to invest $600 billion in the US during call with President Donald Trump
item.description: Saudi crown prince says the kingdom intends to invest $600 billion in the US during call with President Donald Trump

item.title: Firefighters battle to maintain the upper hand on a huge fire north of Los Angeles
Thailand same-sex marriage law takes effect: "Every love is the same"
item.description: Hundreds of LGBTQ couples in Thailand get married as the country's landmark marriage equality law comes into effect.

item.title: OOPS: Trump Accidentally Gives Up The Game With 3 Very Revealing Words
Russia 'very closely' monitoring Trump's sanctions threats, Kremlin says
item.description: "We carefully record all the nuances," Kremlin spokesperson Dmitry Peskov said.

item.title: California fires live updates: New LA County fire explodes to over 10,000 acres
item.description: At least 28 people are believed to be dead and more than a dozen others remain unaccounted for as multiple wildfires rage across Southern California.

item.title: Oscar nominations to be announced Thursday for 2025 awards
item.description: Nominations for the 97th annual Academy Awards are being announced Thursday morning. Watch live as the full list of Oscar nominees is unveiled.

item.title: Former Arkansas officer arrested, charged with assault in beating of handcuffed inmate
